Class AbandonedShipCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AbandonedShipCard.AbandonedShipCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewableCard, Serializable
public class AbandonedShipCard extends AdventureCard implements Serializable, ViewableCard
Represents an "Abandoned Ship" adventure card in the game. This card can affect the number of flight days lost, credits gained, and astronauts lost. Its behavior is delegated to an internal state AbandonedShipState.
See Also:

      public AbandonedShipCard(String pngName, String name, Game game, int level, boolean tutorial, int flightdaysLost, int credits, int lostAstronauts)
      Constructs a new AbandonedShipCard.
      Parameters:
      pngName - the name of the associated PNG image
      name - the name of the card
      game - the current game instance
      level - the level of the card
      tutorial - true if the card is used in tutorial mode
      flightdaysLost - the number of flight days lost
      credits - the amount of credits gained
      lostAstronauts - the number of lost astronauts
